title: Reactions to racist posts on social media in the U.S. 2017
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Ignore the post and lowest at Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).
The maximum Response Ignore the post has got 6.67 times higher Share of respondents than the minimum Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).

Response Ignore the post has the highest Share of respondents and Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) has the lowest Share of respondents.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Response Unfollow/unfriend the poster.
The highest Response Ignore the post has 34.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.).

The Response Ignore the post has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Unfollow/unfriend the poster, and Comment on/ reply to the post. Down to the Response Discuss the content with the poster offline (e.g. on the phone in person etc.) which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 5 Responses is roughly 20.2.
